title: GameStop Investors Still Await Riches From Epic Short Squeeze
sub_head: Short-seller theories that helped drive companyâ€™s 2021 rally have gained a large following online
body:
Ben Wehrman clocks into his job as a Tesla salesman five days a week. His real work begins when he clocks out at night.
The 27-year-old Californian often spends his evenings, coffee in hand, researching a topic that has captivated hordes of individual investors online: an alleged Wall Street conspiracy to suppress the price of GameStop Corp. shares.
